title: How to Make Deep Fried Shrimp Balls

steps.headline: Put the shrimp and pork fat in a blender and mix until finely blended.
Add seasoning ingredients to the above and continue to blend only enough to mix all ingredients.
Form the mixture into 1 inch (2.5 cm) balls.
Roll the shrimp mixture balls in toast crumbs.
Deep-fry the balls, about 350 degrees until golden.
Remove and drain on absorbent paper.
Serve hot with peppercorn salt or catsup.

text: Put the shrimp and pork fat in a blender and mix until finely blended.  Add seasoning ingredients to the above and continue to blend only enough to mix all ingredients.  Form the mixture into 1 inch (2.5 cm) balls.  Roll the shrimp mixture balls in toast crumbs.  Deep-fry the balls, about 350 degrees until golden.  Remove and drain on absorbent paper.  Serve hot with peppercorn salt or catsup.
